title: Season VII Announcement
description:
Have you left the lights on? Good, because you will need them. Spooked Season VII returns September, 2022. Be prepared for 26 entirely new episodes, created in the dark of night.

To listen to all episodes of Spooked as they’re released subscribe to the Luminary Channel on Apple Podcasts, or directly on Luminary at https://luminary.link/spooked
itunes:subtitle: Have you left the lights on? Good, because you will need them. Spooked Season VII returns September, 2022. Be prepared for 26 entirely new episodes, created in the dark of night.
